Hi all  I have a financial question on BTO flats. Using a hypothetical scenario where I take on a HDB loan:My remaining balance to pay for the flat (after deducting my entire OA): $500kAssume the max. available loan amount from HDB is also $500kIs there any way to partially pay down the $500k 'remaining balance' with cash (let's say $100k)  and then take on a HDB loan (on the date of key collection) of $400k? From what I understood  HDBdoes not allowus to pay down the 'remaining balance' partially with cash.Thank you for any help on this! 🙏
Hdb loan has no early repayment penalty. After collecting the hdb with $500k loan  u can login to hdb website and pay off $100k if you want.
Although I don’t understand why u would wanna do that.Hdb loan is 2.6% paU put your cash into any high yield savings account also have 3.5% pa at least.

Perfectly understood 🙏. I wanted to know if there's that possibility of early repaymentSo if we assume interest rates stay where they are now (assumption)  then it would be better to take the 'longest repayment period option' to repay my loan  right?
Yes. Hdb loan is one of the cheapest longest and most flexible repayment loan u can take in your life. Maximise it.
Ya la. Keep for those who need it la. U earn big big take bank loan la. Haha
Bank is heartless if U suay suay default. They may force U sell flat
No la is my fiancee la… I don’t earn that much myself
But I agree la. Hdb loan and SOB/BTO are SG privilege. Enjoy it.
Next time 10 year MOP timeframe don’t know how liao
If can get HDB loan pls get HDB loan. Govt look after citizens interest over bank interests coz they need votes.
Anyways can refinance with Banks if the interests rates become as low as during covid
Post crisis if they raise to 4-5% u will 😭😭😭
Yea so do it if you know you can payoff quickly

Hi  I tried searching for more info on amaze card but still didn't get a clear answer to my query. Will appreciate if you or anyone could let me know if I link amaze card with maybank FnF card and make payments in Malaysia (in RM) thru amaze card  will amaze card charge the amount in SGD to maybank credit card and therefore I won't kenna FX or DCC charges by maybank? 🙏
Yes amaze will convert it to sgd
Thanks! I should have joined this group much earlier. Lol
Oh  but maybank FnF 8% cashback is only on RM spending... So if amaze charge SGD to it  so don't think I will get 8% cash back if I use amaze linked to FnF if my understanding is correct.

If you had spent more than $800 in Singapore on that month n hit maximum cashback  it is better not to use Amaze+FnF  so you continue enjoy 8% onRinggitspend.For details  pls readhttps://www.maybank2u.com.sg/en/personal/cards/credit/maybank-family-and-friends-mastercard.page?
Go see my explanation on how maybank fnf work when u spend on bonus cat of maybank fnf in ringgit earlier
Spend ringgit directly if not bonus cat  spend with amaze if bonus cat not reach cap
Got it. Just saw the 5 cashback categories on maybank website... Min spend $800 required to get 8%. 🙏
